#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
  cin.tie(NULL);
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
  ll k,n; cin>>k>>n;
  ll a[k+1];
  for(int i=0;i<k;i++) cin>>a[i];
  ll low=0,high=1e13;
  while(low<high){
    ll ans=0;
    ll  mid=(low+high)/2;
    for(int i=0;i<k;i++){
      ans+=mid/a[i];
    }
    if(ans>=n) high=mid;
    else low=mid+1;
  }
  cout<<low<<"\n";
  return 0;
}
